title: CBRE Real Estate Web App
description: Property management tool with Mapbox and real-time data.
fullDescription: Developed a frontend application for CBRE Singapore using React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Mapbox to visualize real estate leasing data and manage properties across multiple views. Backend APIs built with Spring Boot.

title: AI-powered Resume Chat
description: Interactive resume Q&A powered by Groq, LangChain, and Supabase.
fullDescription: A fullstack AI service allowing users to chat with a resume using Groq's LLaMA 3, LangChain for retrieval, and Supabase for vector search and storage. Built with FastAPI and integrated into a Next.js frontend.

title: BKRM Middleware API for Banking
description: Banking integration platform built with Apache Camel and Talend.
fullDescription: Developed middleware APIs for BKRM using Apache Camel and Talend Studio to integrate internal banking systems with external services. Deployed and monitored the solution on GCP.

title: BKR API Catalog Frontend
description: Frontend API catalog using Drupal and Apigee.
fullDescription: Developed a frontend catalog for BKR's API platform using PHP and Drupal, integrated with Apigee for API management and sandbox access. Hosted at https://sandbox.bankrakyat.com.my/.

title: PTMFinance Integration
description: Java middleware app to integrate with BMC and generate finance documents.
fullDescription: Built a middleware Java application to integrate with BMC Remedy and automate the generation of receipt and invoice documents for finance operations.

title: DC Integration to Documentum
description: Java-based file integration with Documentum storage.
fullDescription: Created a Java application for uploading and storing documents in Documentum as part of a document management workflow.

title: MDO SLA & OLA Tracker
description: Java app to calculate SLA/OLA metrics.
fullDescription: Engineered a Java application to compute Service-Level Agreements (SLA) and Operational-Level Agreements (OLA) from system logs and events.

title: SSC IT Assignment Automation
description: Routing assignment automation tool integrated with BMC.
fullDescription: Developed a Java-based automation system to manage and route IT service assignments based on predefined rules, integrated with BMC Mid Tier.

title: SSC Travel Request Workflow
description: Custom travel request workflow app integrated with Traveloka.
fullDescription: Implemented a travel request system in Java integrated with Traveloka, Mitra Tour, and BMC Mid Tier to handle custom workflows and approvals.
